title: Taku Hiraoka’s 3rd Place Run – 2016 Burton US Open Halfpipe
description: Dropping in with the second-to-last run of the competition, it seemed like Taku Hiraoka fed off the pressure and went ballistic, landing his frontside 1440 tail grab on the last hit. It was his first time. His 88.25 was just .37 off second place.

asset.title: Taku Hiraoka’s 3rd Place Run – 2016 Burton US Open Halfpipe
asset.description: Dropping in with the second-to-last run of the competition, it seemed like Taku Hiraoka fed off the pressure and went ballistic, landing his frontside 1440 tail grab on the last hit. It was his first time. His 88.25 was just .37 off second place.
asset.author: Burton Snowboards

transcripts: It's going to be hard cause Shaun is sitting on that 95.6, but your second to last rider to drop here can he take out Shaun White huge inverted front side 540 tailgrab, into a back side 9 look at how big Taku Hiraoka is going frontside double cork 1080 it just doesn't get any better than this this is halfpipe riding at its finest like that yes the 14 to finish are you kidding me.
